properties.description: This Policy Assignment Enforces Azure Naming Standards across Azure Resources.

nonComplianceMessages.message: Please following the Azure naming standards as outlined in the Azure DevOps Wiki.
The naming convention for Azure Application Gateways needs to start with "agw-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Azure Automation needs to start with "aaa-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Azure Bastion needs to start with "bas-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for ExpressRoute Circuit needs to start with "erc-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Azure Key Vault needs to start with "akv-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Load Balancers needs to start with "elb-" or "ilb-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Log Analytics Workspace needs to start with "law-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Local Network Gateways needs to start with "lng-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Management Groups needs to start with "mg-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Network Security Groups needs to start with "nsg-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Public IP Addresses needs to start with "pip-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Route Tables needs to start with "udr-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Storage Accounts needs to start with "sta-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Azure Subscriptions needs to start with "sub-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Virtual Network Gateways needs to start with "vng-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
The naming convention for Virtual Networks needs to start with "vnt-", please see the naming conventions in the wiki for more details.
